div.p: K76/906, unit 874, VPRS 3991/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

note.p: MS written by G. Luehmann and signed by M.

div.p: To the Honorable the Chief Secretary
I have the honor to submit for approval the following Estimate* of Expenditure during the 2 months ending 29thFebruary 1876.

Total — Fifty pounds
−
shillings and
−
pen
